mainBoard.name: Skarrg Guildmage
mainBoard.originalText:
{R}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
{1}{R}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: Only creatures you control when the first ability resolves will gain trample. Creatures that come under your control later in the turn won’t have trample. Lands you control that aren’t creatures also won’t gain trample, even if you use the second ability to turn them into creatures later in the turn.

Skarrg Guildmage’s second ability doesn’t affect the land’s name or any other types, subtypes, or supertypes (such as basic or legendary) the land may have. The land will also keep any abilities it had.

foreignData.flavorText: "다른 길드들이 전쟁을 원한다면 우리는 언제든지 준비되 있다는걸 보여주지." —고르 부족장 루릭 타르

foreignData.flavorText: "Se as outras guildas querem uma guerra, elas deveriam saber que estávamos prontos esse tempo todo."— Ruric Thar, chefe do Clã Ghor

foreignData.flavorText: «Если другие гильдии хотят войны, пусть знают, что мы к ней всегда готовы». — Рурик Тар, вождь клана Гхор

foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда Разъяренный Зверюга Груулов или другое существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, то существо дерется с целевым существом под контролем оппонента.

foreignData.name: 古魯怒獸
foreignData.text: 每當古魯怒獸或另一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，該生物與目標由對手操控的生物互鬥。

mainBoard.name: Gruul Ragebeast
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

rulings.text: Gruul Ragebeast's triggered ability isn't optional. However, if no opponent controls a creature when a creature enters under your control, the ability will be removed from the stack.
If one or both of the creatures that are supposed to fight are no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, the fight won't happen. Neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.
If the target creature is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. Neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature you control enters, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."
—Narbulg Nine Fingers

foreignData.flavorText: „Einen Drachen zu besiegen ist ganz leicht. Man braucht nur genügend Platz, um ordentlich weit ausholen zu können." —Narbulg Neunfinger
foreignData.name: Bodenangriff
foreignData.text: Der Bodenangriff fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl so viele Schadenspunkte zu, wie du Länder kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Abatir a un dragón es fácil. Lo único que hace falta es el espacio suficiente para dar impulso a un buen golpe."—Narbulg Nuevededos

foreignData.text: El Asalto terrestre hace daño a la criatura objetivo igual a la cantidad de tierras que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Terrasser un dragon, c'est facile. Il suffit d'avoir suffisamment d'espace pour armer sa frappe. » —Narbulg Neuf Doigts

foreignData.text: L'Assaut terrestre inflige à la créature ciblée un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de terrains que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.name: Assalto Terrestre

foreignData.flavorText: 「ドラゴンを倒すなんて簡単なことさ。思い切り振り抜けるだけの空間さえあればいいんだ。」――九本指のナーブルグ

foreignData.flavorText: "용을 잡기는 쉬워. 무기 한 번 제대로 휘두르기에 충분한 공간만 확보하면 돼." —아홉손가락 나르벌그

foreignData.flavorText: "Derrubar um dragão é fácil. Você só precisa de espaço o bastante para conseguir encaixar um bom golpe." — Narbulg Nove Dedos

foreignData.flavorText: «Завалить дракона проще простого. Главное, чтобы было достаточно места для хорошего замаха». — Нарбулг Девятипалый
foreignData.name: Атака с Земли

foreignData.flavorText: 「擊倒龍很容易。 你只需要有足夠的空間來出手。」 ～九指納博

mainBoard.name: Ground Assault
mainBoard.originalText: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
mainBoard.text: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: The forest can seem like a dense maze. Those who travel the canopy know otherwise.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Wald kann einem wie ein dichtes Labyrinth erscheinen. Diejenigen, die sich durch das Blätterdach bewegen, wissen es besser.
foreignData.name: Pfad des Waldläufers
foreignData.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach bis zu zwei Wald-Karten und bringe diese getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Sendero del guardabosque
foreignData.text: Busca en tu biblioteca hasta dos cartas de bosque y ponlas en el campo de batalla giradas. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText: La forêt peut faire figure d'épais dédale. Pas aux yeux de ceux qui utilisent la canopée pour se déplacer.
foreignData.name: Chemin du ranger
foreignData.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque jusqu'à deux cartes de forêt et mettez-les sur le champ de bataille engagées. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText: La foresta può apparire come un fitto labirinto. Coloro che viaggiano nel folto degli alberi la pensano diversamente.
foreignData.name: Sentiero del Ranger
foreignData.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per trovare fino a due carte Foresta e mettile sul campo di battaglia TAPpate. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: 森は時に入り組んだ迷路に見える。だが樹上を渡り歩く者はそうでないことを知っている。
foreignData.name: レインジャーの道
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーから森カードを最大２枚まで探し、それらをタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.flavorText: 숲은 빽빽한 미로처럼 보일 수 있다. 하지만 숲 속을 아는 자들에게는 전혀 그렇지 않다.
foreignData.name: 레인저의 길
foreignData.text: 당신의 서고에서 최대 두 장까지의 숲 카드를 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignData.flavorText: A floresta pode parecer um labirinto denso. Mas aqueles que viajam pelas copas veem diferente.

foreignData.text: Procure até dois cards de Floresta no seu grimório e coloque-os no campo de batalha virados. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText: Лес может показаться непроходимым лабиринтом. Те, кто путешествует по кронам деревьев, знают, что это не так.
foreignData.name: Путь Лесничего
foreignData.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке не более двух карт Леса и положите их на поле битвы повернутыми. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.flavorText: 树林看起来可能像座深邃迷宫。只有站在树顶的人才能知道方向。

foreignData.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张树林牌，并将它们横置进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 樹林看起來可能像座深邃迷宮。只有站在樹頂的人才能知道方向。
foreignData.name: 護林人路徑
foreignData.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋至多兩張樹林牌，並將它們橫置進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Ranger's Path
mainBoard.originalText: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mainBoard.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

"All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now."

mainBoard.name: Pit Fight
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

rulings.text: If either target of Pit Fight is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve, neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.
The second target of Pit Fight can be another creature you control, but it can’t be the same creature as the first target.

mainBoard.text: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

"Other guilds say the Gruul are savages, no better than the beasts we live with. I say we've found friends who won't stab us in the back."
—Domri Rade

foreignData.flavorText: „Für andere Gilden sind die Gruul Wilde, nichts Besseres als die Tiere, mit denen wir leben. Ich sage dagegen, dass wir Freunde gefunden haben, die uns nicht hintergehen werden." —Domri Rade

foreignData.flavorText: "다른 길드는 그룰이 짐승과 다름없는 야만인이라고 하지. 하지만 내가 보기에 그들은 배신을 모르는 진실된 친구다." —돔리 라데

foreignData.flavorText: "As outras guildas dizem que os Gruul são selvagens, que não somos melhores do que as feras com que vivemos. Eu digo que encontramos amigos que não nos apunhalarão pelas costas."— Domri Rade

mainBoard.flavorText: "The mountain's fire surges beneath your feet, demanding release. Can you not feel it?"

foreignData.flavorText: « Le feu des montagnes gronde sous tes pieds, exigeant d'être libéré. Ne le sens-tu pas ? »
